title: IT ASSISTANT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ClientEarth in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very interesting. I was interviewed by the head of IT and 2 other guys and they were very nice. A lot of questions were asked in relation to the role including scenario based questions. It was an amazing experience overall.
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself and what do you know about Client Earth? Why do you want this role? How would you handle if there is a downtime and no one can work and your MD comes to you with an issue?

title: Grants Officer Interview
Interview Descriptions: The whole interview process was very clear from the start and I had good communication with HR. I did two interview rounds with different people at each stage and two written assessments before the interviews. They made a decision pretty quickly and gave me specific feedback on my interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to convince someone senior; tell me about your experience in report writing; how do you work under pressure; what do you expect to learn from the role.

title: Senior Information Security Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at ClientEarth (London, England) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: I Had two Stages of Interviews. Two people panel at each stages. It was am amazing experience overall. The interviewers were very friendly and open-minded. I even got commended after the seconded stage interview.
Interview Questions: A lot was asked in relation to the role. I also did a presentation at the final stage.

title: Events Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at ClientEarth (London, England) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview was conducted as a zoom call with a two member panel asking competency based questions. There was a friendly atmosphere but demanding questions were asked and a high standard expected. Some of the questions overlapped somewhat The interview lasted around 50 minutes.
Interview Questions: Can you describe a time you worked collaboratively with co-workers to achieve a goal?

title: Legal and Policy Research Officer Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview comprised two rounds spaced a couple of weeks apart, each with a panel of two interviewers. There was a written task to complete in advance of second interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to do this specific role?

title: Grants Manager Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at ClientEarth (London, England) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very nice and relaxed. The panel took time to explain about the company and the role. I was asked about 10 questions which were aimed at the role and my experience
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Client Earth

title: IT Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ClientEarth (London, England) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was invited by email to an interview with the Head of Operations, IT Manager and Senior IT Administrator.  I also had to sit a Technical test with Testdome. The interview was conducted over MS Teams and went very well in my opinion.  The panel each took turns to ask questions which was a mix of managerial and technical questions.  Following the meeting the Head of Operations stayed on the call to discuss renumeration, availability and next stage would be to create a presentation with Q&A fir the Director.
Interview Questions: How would I implement network security?

title: Head of Grants Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at ClientEarth (London, England) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: After submitting my application I had a screening interview with the hiring manager via zoom. I was only asked one or two general questions,  the interview was really informal and lasted approx 30 mins. Due to the nature of the questions, I had the impression they had already identified/recruited someone internally but had to conduct external interviews nonetheless.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join ClientEarth?

title: IT Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at ClientEarth (Hackney, England) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Was a basic two stage interview, the first stage is a written test and a few questions. The second interview was a two to one interview with the management of the team with some basic questions relevant to the nature of the role.
Interview Questions: Some arranged IT questions but different each time

title: Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at ClientEarth (Hackney, England) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: Received a phone call from HR discussing the next steps of the process. The first round included a written task. The second round was a standard interview discussing in more depth about my skills for the role. Overall, the experience was efficient and the interviewers were really friendly.
